div.div: Relationship between Moran’s I for PC1 and Moran’s I for central elevation.
div.p: Negative values of Moran’s I indicate overdispersed traits, though all results are not significantly different from a null expectation. Open circles represent individual genera; dashed line indicates best fit linear regression (t = 3.95, df = 22, p<0.001, r 2 = 0.41).
